entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [AppHost] Don’t assume that last framework in runtimeconfig list contains hostpolicy.dll #71027
  • No way to set TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout #71025
  • TestKeyTransKeyEncryptionAlgorithm_RoundTrip test fails for .NET Framework #71024
  • Assert failure: Consistency check failed: Crst Level violation: Can't take level 17 lock CrstInstMethodHashTable because you already holding level 17 lock CrstInstMethodHashTable #71023
    7.0.0
  • `StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase` compares `"¡a"` and `"¡B"` incorrectly #71018
    7.0.0
  • Enumerable.Chunk remarks slightly incorrect #71016
  • ASP.NET 6 - Out of Memory Exception on App Service #71014
  • ManagedWebSocket throws annoying error when connection is aborted in ReceiveAsync. #71012
  • RegexOptions.Compiled impacts Android startup #71007
  • [libraries-pgo] arm64 failure in System.Tests.DoubleTests.ParsePatterns #71005
    7.0.0
  • DateTimeOffset.Now TimeZone data impacts Android startup #71004
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests crashed due to UnauthorizedAccessException #71003
  • COM interop converts `VT_BSTR/NULL` variants to `null` instead of `string.Empty` #71002
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessWaitingTests.CurrentProcess_WaitNeverCompletes - TaskCanceledException #71000
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.HttpStatusCode.UnprocessableContent #70996
  • Upgrading from netcore3.1 to net6.0 breaks relative path support in SQLCommand #70989
  • Tests failed: Wasm.Build.Tests.BlazorWasmBuildPublishTests due to SIGKILL #70985
  • Make handling of custom attributes more consistent. #70984
  • [API Proposal]: Expose additional flags and validation in `NegotiateAuthentication` #70982
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_ServerCertWithoutContext_NoStapledOcsp #70981
  • Consider overloadding `==` and `!=` for `IPAddress` #70978
  • Prevent renaming apphost executables #70976
  • Ability to customize the runtime location for framework-dependent apps (apphost) #70975
  • cli xUnit tests fail since https://github.com/dotnet/runtime build 20220616.9 #70973
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.PrivateUri.Tests.UriRelativeResolutionTest.Uri_Unicode_SurrogatePairs_Scheme #70972
    7.0.0
  • Test failure net7.0-windows-Release-x64-CoreCLR_release-Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.Public_Interop_Upgrade_Success #70971
  • Could not write lines to file Microsoft.NET.HostModel.ComHost.Tests #70969
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\generics\\Monitor\\EnterExit04\\EnterExit04.cmd #70968
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/Arrays/lcs/lcsvalbox_ro/lcsvalbox_ro.cmd #70967
  • Test failure tracing\\runtimeeventsource\\nativeruntimeeventsource\\nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd #70966
  • System.DllNotFoundException during p/invoke shows incorrect error message. (Linux) #70963
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add property to ZipArchiveEntry to indicate if the entry is encrypted #68897
    7.0.0
  • Detect password protected file with ZipArchive #57197
    7.0.0
  • `UseWindowsService` does not work with `WebApplicationBuilder` #69212
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\1514\\InterlockExchange\\InterlockExchange.cmd #67074
  • Crash when running Handling.ThrowAndCatch_ManyCatchBlocks on WASM #59034
    7.0.0
  • The variable in .razor file of Blazor WebAssembly project couldn't display hexadecimal correctly in EE window #51358
    7.0.0
  • BenchmarkDotNet has failed to build the auto-generated boilerplate code in wasm configurations #58906
    7.0.0
  • System.MissingMethod.Exception when using static abstract method #63411
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox tests cancelled or throwing KeyNotFoundException - test files cannot be found #70983
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core tests for CurrentDirectory fail for Browser on Windows #70887
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] windows/WasmTestOnBrowser tracking issue #55429
    7.0.0
  • m_alignpad = 0 assert failure #70958
  • Optimize System.Buffers for arm64 using cross-platform intrinsics #35033
    7.0.0
  • ConsoleLogger output is garbled with color codes when redirected #70156
    7.0.0
  • JIT ARM64: Funclets with "frame type 5" not handled correctly #66089
    7.0.0
  • Async io never completes in .net 6 #69377
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests #68409
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #69446
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT FSharp issue #70999
  • Contract violation in GC Profiler test #67630
  • [HTTP/3] AltSvc Mock tests disabled #54050
    Future
  • MailAddress.TryCreate: allow null for the address argument #70920
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #64159
    7.0.0
  • Fix GS cookie support #70071
    7.0.0
  • .Net application aborts at startup with "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" - .Net 7 preview 5 #70758
    7.0.0
  • W^X double mapping doesn't work correctly on macOS under Rosetta emulation #70910
    7.0.0
  • InvokeVoidAsync Performance Issue arch-wasm #66384
    7.0.0
  • PGO: Optimize isinst with class probes #55325
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Separate out char marshalling rules to a separate MarshallingGeneratorFactory. #71028
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Do not use full memory barrier for osx/arm64 #71026
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix Ordinal Ignore Case string compare #71022
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Move allocation of command line argument array to C# #71021
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: disable tests failing on CI #71020
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve and simplify `MakeTmpArgNode` #71019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update design docs to reflect our new marshaller design from partner feedback #71017
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Various cryptographic allocation improvements #71015
    area-System.Security
  • DefaultBinder named parameter support skipping default parameters #71013
    area-System.Reflection
  • Enable IDE0170 (Simplify property pattern) and IDE0200 (remove unnecessary lambda expression) #71011
    area-Meta
  • Base64 library tests: use full encoding map #71006
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Trying to reproduce #70010 #71001
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Additional policy for limiting RTT PINGs in SocketsHttpHandler #70995
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Set utf-8 for mono on msvc #70994
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Try catch for unreachable host in AltSvc H/3 upgrade test #70993
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix reordering arguments when normalizing in impPopCallArgs #70992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Simplify random GDV #70980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IPAddress equality comparison in MsQuicListener #70979
    area-System.Net
  • Ensure consistent reflectability for generic methods #70977
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Make sure AdditionalTimeZoneChecks trait is added to xunit-excludes #70974
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS][Android] Fix crash in Exception.CaptureDispatchState #70970
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Include all dlerror messages to DllNotFoundException #70964
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Windows/Arm64: Use 8.1 atomic instructions if they are available #70921
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Exposing IRootFunctions.Hypot and IRootFunctions.Root #71010
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add AddSystemd() and AddWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64 DecodeFromUtf8 and EncodeToUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix side effect on Firefox of getting bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol #70990
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Enabled WasmTestOnBrowser run on Windows for Browser. #70890
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `gtEffectiveVal` for `GT_ADD` op1 in `optCreateAssertion` #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Model string literal objects as invariant and non-GLOB_REF #70986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix arm64 funclet frame type 5 #70922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Extend partial disablement of SkippingHiddenFiles (#65280) #70763
    area-System.IO
  • Minor refactoring for `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` #70767
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Collections contain stale object IDs #70924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • Stop wrapping `SIMD` nodes in `OBJ`s #70888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Removes abstract providers and mock from S.N.Quic #70421
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix nullable annotations on MailAddress.TryCreate #70943
    area-System.Net
  • Enable IDE0031 (Use null propagation) #70965
    area-Meta
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Add support for randomized guard stack cookies #70806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable W^X on macOS under Rosetta emulation #70912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #70956
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Make SuperPMI more explicit about JIT in error messages #70938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add markdown readme for System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #70610
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix loop alignment issue #70936
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable fake hot/cold splitting on ARM64 #70708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [custom_attrs] Use the image's ALC instead of the default one (#68266) #70346
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70865
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics, 6.0.x
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add CreateChained rate limiter API #70739
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-author-action
  • R2R -> instrumented tier0 -> optimized tier1 #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add TranslateKey to PartitionedRateLimiter #69407
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Renaming files because they don't reflect the IL code used in the tests #69814
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Added the fix to make use of the heap hard limit instead of the region range while using large pages. #68629
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Do not generate impossible instantiations for constrained generics in Mono AOT #70838
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Fix reordering of call args on x86 #70931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Unix x64 #70960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove allocation in ImmutableArray Builder Sort #70850
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 warnings round II #70783
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Optimization. Use Min/Max intrinsics if one of arguments is constant. #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Extend MonoAOTCompiler Task #70851
    area-Build-mono
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70560
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete the Unix x64 implicit byref quirk #70961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on x86 #70779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: add ability to filter during collection #70937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement NegotiateAuthentication API #70720
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Migrate to ref/out param while reading data from typed array #70823
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix leaking mach ports & memory after task_threads() #70338
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Tar Global Extended Attributes API changes #70869
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT: handle case where we are cloning adjacent sibling loops #70874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Ensure SOS works with hot/cold splitting #1913
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Avoid relying on class code value #1912

PullRequests

Updated

  • Initial hot cold splitting support for crossgen2/VM #1900

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable test File_contains_certificates_very_commonly_used_in_NuGet_org_package_signatures #26115
  • Issue falling back to 6.0.300 manifests with 6.0.400 SDK #26112
  • Enable running test scenarios in .NET containers without SDK installed #26107

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix unit test #26116
  • Fix error log message string.Format exception for failed ZipDeploy #26106
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rollback razor tooling version #26105
    Area-CodeFlow
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26032
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959
    Area-Infrastructure
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Change BrotliCompress response files to quote file paths #26077
    Area-CLI
  • Move ILLink targets to the linker repo #25993
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reference older MSBuild for .NET Framework tasks #26080
    Area-VS
  • add post actions tests for dotnet new #26074
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Helix test runner does not optimally partition tests between work items #62036
  • SyntaxValueProvider.ForAttributeWithMetadataName can likely be made even more efficient by avoiding any work on untouched syntax trees. #62029
  • GetTypeByMetadataName may not properly handle ambiguity in non-CLS-compliant scenarios #62025
  • Roslyn should provide better error message than "error:03000098:digital envelope routines::invalid digest" on RSA+SHA1 unavailability #62024
  • VS2022 Quick action to Convert to file scope for the whole project/solution is not available. #62018
    Next
  • Rename UI can be obscured immediately after showing #62016

Closed

  • Add VS typescript access to LSP #58777
    17.3
  • Roslyn Code Actions violate language server protocol by making text changes server => client, corrupting semantic tokens #48991
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Typing the colon of a named parameter in a Razor file results in a second colon #60756
    17.3
  • [LSP] Enable navigation to decompiled sources #51651
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Remove completion feature flag and enable returning TextEdits by default #51439
    17.3
  • [LSP] Track perf for LSP requests #50909
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Add language names for c#/vb request handlers #46880
    Backlog
  • Curly Brace Range Highlighting #45062
    Backlog
  • LSP Hover should support all tags that quick info does #43387
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense (and tooling in general) is busted for local generators #62021
  • Assignment operator on array field may execute with inconsistent left / right ordering #62020
  • Interface members marked `internal` or `protected` are required to be public in implementing types #62005

PullRequests

Created

  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • Add Razor external access for VS MEF host services #62034
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Revert "Merge pull request #61862 #62033
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #59631 from jmarolf/feature/run-third-part… #62032
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "[LSP] Add support for reporting project level diagnostics in … #62031
    Area-IDE
  • [Validation only] Revert "Merge pull request #61864" #62030
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove more delegates from FindRefs. #62027
    Area-IDE
  • Add nuget reference to fix ide benchmarks #62026
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for ConvertNamespace refactoring #62019
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Simplify embedded languages type hierarchy #61994
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix stack overflow in CSharpStringIndentationService #61978
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62028
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move to more static lambdas in find-references to prevent captures. #62017
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62022
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61997
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge common find-refs data into its own type. #62011
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support virtual conversion and equality operators #61963
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Merge main to features/file-types #62015
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62038
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unnecessary nullable directives #62037
    Area-Compilers
  • Add analyzers to unnecessary nullable directives #62004
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Inheritance completions massive improvement #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add compliance pipeline for running APIScan #61905
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Shadow Copy all analyzer dependencies #61974
    Area-Analyzers
  • Separate IEditorConfigOptionMappingService from IGlobalOptionService #61899
    Area-IDE
  • Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers #62002
    Area-IDE
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll in Solution support for Enable nullable refactoring #61879
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RenderFragment becomes visible after hot reload #42312
  • [Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect] Manage Oidc workflow in a popup #42307
  • dotnet user-jwts create throws exception if user secrets JSON contains objects #42306
    7.0-preview6
  • dotnet user-jwts create throws exception if launch settings file not found #42304
    7.0-preview6
  • HTTP2_Protocol_Error when debugging ASP.NET MVC Core from Visual Studio #42303
  • RFC9110 - UnprocessableContent #42302
  • [Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect] handle callback called with GET Verb #42297

Closed

  • AddRoleValidator incorrect generic argument name #42294
  • Publish updated version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements built against .NET 6 #38724
    7.0-preview6
  • No nullable warning on WaitForShutdown() #42238
  • Personal access token support in Identity #41262
    Discussions
  • Add <InputDateTime> blazor component #18078
  • [Blazor] Actions in for loop, i always at end loop value #42301
  • Is the IsReusable property of the ModelStateInvalidFilter class necessary? #42279
  • Github actions CI blocked on MacOS #42273

PullRequests

Created

  • Custom HTML elements rendering Blazor components #42314
    area-blazor
  • Cleanup project template ide.host.json files #42311
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview6
  • Improve missing/malformed file handling in user-jwts #42309
    area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts

Merged

  • Move Composite files to easily-found folder #42296
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix SignalR Streaming example #42281
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b1f84bf` to `86add13` #42298
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Remove incorrect RequiresUnreferencedCode from WriteJsonAsync #42295
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [release/3.1] Move to MCR for dotnet/runtime-deps #42246
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [SignalR] Replace Single(connectionId) with Client(connectionId) and Caller #42236
    area-signalr
  • [release/2.1] Move to MCR for dotnet/runtime-deps #42245
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly Project Template #42215
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Add AuthorizationBuilder #42264
    area-security
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • [main] Move to MCR for dotnet/runtime-deps #42248
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • Make H2 WebSockets ignore MaxRequestBodySize and MinRequestBodyDataRate #42269
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot run unpackaged Windows app - MAUI 6.04 #8186
  • Toggle visibility ok when start as IsVisible="True", but not when starting IsVisible="False" #8185
  • Using a compatibility renderer on Android/Windows fails to start the App #8183
  • <Label Text={Binding .} /> works in Debug but not Release #8182
  • CollectionView items are overlapping when loaded on Windows #8179
  • CollectionView stoped to work after VS update to 17.3.0 Preview 2.0 #8178
  • Properties Height and Width have values equal -1 after Initialization of page components #8176
  • Performance issue in LayoutExtensions.ShouldArrangeLeftToRight #8175
  • Accessibility Insigths for windows - flyout items with shell are wrongly named #8174
  • Collection View in MAUI iOS, Android scrolling erratically. #8170
  • Newly Introduced System.AccessViolationException #8168

Closed

  • [Android] Shell.Current.GoToAsync throws exception 'Current Root View cannot be null' #8159
  • The scrolled event does not fire when ScrollView Orientation is Horizontal #5090
    6.0-sr2
  • Navigation.PushAsync(); on windows platform throws exception: Catastrophic failure (0x8000FFFF (E_UNEXPECTED)) with same page instance #8123
  • [Android] Resetting App.Current.MainPage doesn't show the new page. #8141
  • PushModalAsync on Android not working in latest Visual Studio Update #8062
  • MAUI Blazor projects with specific names don't build #8156
  • Compiling Mac app in VSforMac 2022 preview, app loses previously granted permissions #7593
  • Button is clickable even if the IsEnable property of the container control is false. #8169
  • Maui mediapicker on Android Platform opens a blank screen #7776
  • FilePicker, no title seen, not sure what to expect? #8173
  • Usability: Too much documentation shown in Visual Studio for Button Type #8163
  • How to remove bounce effect in ScrollView #7026
  • Is Maui.Graphics dead? #6998
    .NET 7
  • [Documentation] Only really working and tested examples in documentation #7205
  • Cannot find nuget for lottie animations in MAUI #8171
  • Button is not disabled at start when BindCommad(...) is used after Bind(IsEnambledProperty,...) #8152
  • XmlnsDefinitionAttribute and CS0246 The type or namespace name could not be found #8158
  • GradientStop throws ArgumentOutOFRangeException on maccatalyst but works on windows #7889
  • Pin target MAUI workload by using rollback file #8066

PullRequests

Created

  • Make VisualElement.ZIndexProperty BP public #8184
    area/layout 🔲
  • Use FabricBot to label partner issues instead of custom GitHub action #8181
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Debug logger to MAUI templates #8180
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Handler allocation tests #8177

Merged

  • Hook up horizontal scroll events on Android #8021
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8053
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8056
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Modal Navigation with Shell #8117
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Make implicit package refs privateassets=all #8064
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Revert recent changes to fix Layout issues #8136
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, fatal, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix for #5523 MauiWebView not loading local files on Windows #7672
    platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, 6.0-sr2
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! #8147
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • [Android] Fix crash using ContentViews inside CollectionView #8051
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, fatal, 6.0-sr3
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8060
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1210.39 to 1.0.1245.22 #8055
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2.1 #7890
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump NSubstitute from 4.2.2 to 4.3.0 #7928
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tizen] Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #8133
    area/layout 🔲, platform/tizen
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22302.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22310.1 #7985
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Must I use nullable property when sub select before left join? #28273

Closed

  • Allow tagging migrations when applying them to database, and let unapplying them by tag. #28245
  • Implement ObjectMaterialized event #15911
    7.0.0
  • Move CosmosConventionSetBuilder out of internal apis. #28220
  • FK differences between 2 tables. #28203
  • Why is there a GitHub Project in this repo #28259
    7.0.0-preview6
  • SQL Server: Scaffold HasTrigger if the table contains triggers #28185
    7.0.0-preview6
  • Provide a hook for identity resolution #20124
    7.0.0-preview6
  • EF Core throws InvalidOperationException because [NotMapped] attribute is not declared over a readonly property #28221

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Implement entity materialization interception #28274
  • Interceptor for identity resolution when attaching graphs #28246
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.0.0-preview2.22096.2 to 5.0.0-preview3.22168.1 #28278

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.27.2 to 3.28.0 #28277
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • "Scaffold" triggers for SQL Server #28253

Updated

  • Custom aggregate translations #28110
  • Translate spatial aggregates #28115
  • Fix tool when using under .NET 6 for real this time. #28210
